Review.Contenu: Signing up and getting started has been incredibly painful.  We want and need to get started ASAP and are very frustrated with all the hoops that are required to jump through in order to actually get a username and password and get moving.
Mixed on communication from the organization. I feel like kind of a mess.

I have not been using DonorPerfect for a long time, but I wish pulling reports were smoother. Also, being able to label donors without flags. I'm not sure if there is another way to do that, but it's difficult pulling donors or stakeholders, sorting them, and realizing they have a paragraph worth of flags. I am participating in training next week with my organization. I hope these items become more evident.

Review.Titre: I signed up and then nothing happened!
Review.Contenu: I havent had much experience yet with Donor Perfect, but the experience I have had is odd. I registered for the site and began the process of creating an account. I paid and was told by my contact person that I would hear back with next steps. That was 9 days ago!! I have no idea where I am in the process. Since then I have emailed my contact person and then called and have heard nothing in response!

Review.Titre: In times like this when we are…
Review.Contenu: In times like this when we are desperate for the convenience of our online forms to meet our needs, I wish for the following:-an upgrade on your very limited font and color choices-ease of design process, steps -a variety of choicesMoving forward with our donor base may be the online forms.  With such limited options on design / options, it's difficult to make each and every form vary.  With our limited staff I wish it was was easier .FILTER PAGE: Why can't your search engine find the filters through their ID#, besides the descriptions, I record all filter id#s so I can locate them correctly because of the many versions createdSEARCHES:  SHOW: This always defaults to 25 . For a large data base like ours, it's truly a pain to keep on having to pick ALL or more than 25.***I wil say this again and again you have a very good and knowledgeable SUPPORT TEAM!!!

Review.Titre: I believe you seem to make changes…
Review.Contenu: I believe you seem to make changes mostly for DONOR Perfect staff without asking the vast payers what the impact will be on them. And then what? Frankly, this question caught me unawares and I cannot do it justice.The changes to "Date  by Gift" was particularly troublesome!
lacks flexibility. good for small orgs with simple, annual fund style fundraising. insufficient for major donor programs and grant tracking. inexpensive, which is good.

I was enrolled in the 2 day intermediate course.  I found the course to be beneficial however I thought there would be more people that were  actually currently using Donor Perfect.  Most attendees had Database experience but were just transitioning into Donor Perfect. I was hoping to delve into more advanced learning and how to resolve some current issues I am having.I also felt the instructor moved through some topics too quickly.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect has been great to track…
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect has been great to track our contact information as a smaller organization. However as we look to grow and expand I have found their system to be limiting in functionality from a reporting standpoint, weblink functionality, etc. Sometimes there is functionality available in one context that is not available in another and you have to pay a customization fee each time you want to apply it outside of their box. Our organization is constantly evolving and we need a system that can evolve with us. If we are not able to look into additional and affordable options for DonorPerfect and other integrated services we would consider looking into other donor management platforms.
responsive and knowledgeable about the product
Easy service, quick response times.

Review.Titre: Impressive platform / costs not perfectly explained.
Review.Contenu: Impressive platform and it sounded easy and clear. As we were signing up and reading our agreement we realized more questions were in order and PayPal, if used would have to be manually entered in to the system. This adds some cost to using Donor Perfect and another detail when clarified had to be added so our cost went up a little more. We still think we’ll benefit from your product and look forward to getting it set up.

Donor Perfect has been Great! The reports are very helpful and customizable for our nonprofit needs.  Fairly easy to navigate. Support is excellent! Having access to Knowledgebase is very helpful when you don't quite understand something and you want a quick reference. Very easy to create your own screen as to how you want it to look. If you get a chance to take the Digging Deeper Seminar I suggest it, so worth it, very helpful and full of great information.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect provides the needs we…
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect provides the needs we have as a small non-profit (one full time, two casual employees).  Data entry is easy, and the program is accessible through the app/home computer when out of the office.  It would be great if we could customize templates better so that are unique to our organizational needs and events.  Customer service has always been exceptional.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect is good but could be better
Review.Contenu: I really like DonorPerfect, with a few exceptions. Report writing and forms building isn’t necessarily intuitive. While I do t have a lot of experience, when I try to get a simple report or want to create a new form, it’s just not as easy as I think it might be.

Review.Titre: I am having a very hard time generating…
Review.Contenu: I am having a hard time generating reports now. Even when I have seen articles, videos and tutorials, I sill have doubts about filters and some other things, and have not been able to get the information I want. There are some areas of improvement when it comes to the report builder and reporting in general.

Review.Titre: Status quo need to see something more substantive
Review.Contenu: I find that pretty much nothing has changed in the platform from the virus outbreak maybe if there was something of substance change to see and measure against but for now everything that I use in DP platform is status as usual. That being said it is a solid product and help I have lists of items for improvements but slowly some of them have had happen.

Review.Titre: I'm just learning the platform so this…
Review.Contenu: I'm just learning the platform so this comes from that point of view.  the training videos went a little to fast and were a bit too busy and seemed to be geared for children. I had to pause the video to read the content because it went so quickly.  Not horrible but... Otherwise so far so good.  I really appreciate the fact that you offer webinars to help newbies with the learning curve.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect has been a really great…
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect has been a really great donor management platform that has really helped provide all of the tools I need to do proper donor stewardship. I love that they have lots of training videos and FAQ's. Their support teams have been very helpful whenever I have questions.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect is a tool that…
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect is a tool that continuously improves to meet the needs of there subscribers.  The support staff works with each person until the question is answered or problem solved.

It is really helpful as a board member to be able to help staff do things like change addresses, add donors, etc.I'm not sure if an email is sent through a mail merge using DP that it gets automatically recorded as a contact. Because you don't want LOTS of people accessing ALL the info, maybe a short webinar on how to put in contacts for board members in order to track stewardship would be good.It would be nice if when using Constant Contact it would record that email as a contact automatically.It would be more helpful to have the same format for an organization as for a person. Just add an extra line for an organization and check that box if you want.  For small communities like ours, most businesses are mom and pops so sorting alphabetically by name (owner) would be better in some cases.I know we aren't using it to its capacity because the learning curve is always bigger than one thinks and we have limited staff time to do this.

I love Donor Perfect’s ease-of-use. They have great phone support that gets me through all kinds of situations successfully. I would like to see a more robust search tool and improvements to reporting.

Certainly appreciated the webinar and information regarding new and innovative way to communicate with donors during this unusual and historic health crisis.  Several great ideas were shared and it was so helpful to hear not only from other Donor Perfect users but also the Donor Perfect staff had some great ideas as well.  It always amazes me that the customer service, training, and coaching that we receive from Donor Perfect is always the best.  Thank you!

Review.Titre: We do appreciate Donor Perfect and know…
Review.Contenu: We do appreciate Donor Perfect and know we are not using as much as we will as time moves forward.  Keep doing all you do and your assistance is very helpful.

DonorPerfect is user friendly and allows for a lot of customization. There is an abundance of resources to help those who are new including webinars, blogs, knowledgebase etc.and the customer support line is a reliable source of assistance.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect continues to be a strong…
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect continues to be a strong Fund raising management system.  They keep trying to improve both basic functioning as well as advanced concepts.  I have used the product for years and would recommend it for any Development department large and small.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect gets the job done
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect gets the job done!  We like that all our donor management is done in one place.  makes things simple on the accounting side of things. Some things are a little overly complicated.  Too many options, but its overall, just what we need

I truly appreciate all that DonorPerfect does to help their community. The constant updates, surveys asking for feedback, and resources to help with all sorts of things (Giving Tuesday, coronavirus, etc.) are so helpful to me and my organization. This score is really more of a 4.5, but I can't give a full 5 stars because there are some things that I'm not a huge fan of, namely some of the updates to reports we use all the time. This is partially due to my dislike of change, but I think it would be nice to keep a Classic or Traditional version of often-used reports for those of us who are having issues with the new versions. For example, the new Daily Log report has been a huge problem for me and all the Excel spreadsheets I've created with this report since it was updated have errors on them. I don't know how to fix the problem and others who also use the reports I run for them have issues, too. It's not a HUGE deal, but it would just be nice to have the option to not always use the updated versions of things. But overall, we are very pleased with DonorPerfect!!
Donor Perfect is very user friendly. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because there are one or 2 items that are rather inefficient in my opinion.

User-friendly and intuitive navigation to most features. Ability to upload and mass import information. Compatibility with constant contact, QuickBooks, and other platforms. Wish more features were included in basic packages like Donor Search and events management. I'd also like to see more compatible credit card swipers.
No timeline given on how long the issue will be solvedIssue sent to development team took long time to resolve and deployNo notification to customer after issue solved and deployed

Review.Titre: We like Donor Perfect a lot
Review.Contenu: We like Donor Perfect a lot. The support staff is amazing and the new products and services that have been added over the past year are very helpful.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect is very user friendly
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect is very user friendly and the customer support is outstanding. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is the pricing.

Donor Perfect is an excellent donor software that accommodates all of our needs. It is very customizable and the reporting section is extensive. Donor Perfect offers really great customer support as well.

My organization had used another CRM for many years, since the late 1980s without ever updating or upgrading it. It had been state-of-the-art when we first acquired it but, as is true of some legacy software created by a large company, it was so outdated that no one used it anymore. And the annual fee had become quite expensive.As a result, we looked at more than a dozen fundraising platforms and demoed at least six different ones, including a cloud-based version of the CRM we had at the time. We chose DonorPerfect because of the simplicity of the interface and ease of use, both in inputting new information and retrieving data on reports. DP offers easy to understand on-demand videos for every aspect of its use. It also has expert facilitators for live videos and trainers providing clear, detailed instructions for organization-specific sessions. For the latter training workshops, you are provided with a video of the session and a detailed write-up of instructions. This reinforces learning for attendees and provides tailored training for the rest of team who were unable to attend.While the migration process was initially bumpy, DP assigned a dedicated staffer to work with us at no extra charge to make sure we were happy with the final result.My organization has found DP to be a good platform to allow programs to improve and create effective multichannel fundraising campaigns.
Overall, very easy to navigate but when keeping a direction manual for myself and other teammates, it is hard to keep up with when Donor Perfect makes changes to the process.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect does a lot of things very well
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect does a lot of things very well and has all the capabilities we need.
It was great, but it was too fast for me.I do understand the  amount of time against the agendas we have to coverThanks
Need a better Notes section, like in Razors Edge.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect is a great addition to our organization
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect has really help our organization stay organized and keep detailed records. Before we got DP we used old fashioned files and excel documents, not with DP we are organized and able to track our donors over the years. Only recommendation for anyone getting DP is to take your time learning how to properly record data. If it's imputed incorrectly it can make it more difficult to use.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect review for Catherine's House.....
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect is a very good donor management platform for Catherine's House. I have to give their customer service team a huge shout out for their excellent response time and patience with my long learning curve! I did not know this system when begnning my position with Catherine's House. I found the tutorials avaialble online along with their support made this an easier process for me.

Our organization has been using Donor Perfect Online for several years now.  I love the "canned" reports that provide so much information about our donor base.  I have found the Knowledge Base very helpful when I am trying something new and have also used the Support Team to help me solve reporting issues.  Overall DPO is user friendly and I like how they collect and actually implement user suggestions.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect has been good for us
Review.Contenu: Our company's experience using DonorPerfect has been great! It has assisted us in not only keeping a record of all our donors, but to clearly help us strategize in strengthening the relationship with our donors. We're been able to track all the times we've touched or haven't touched our donors. So for us, this has been a great instrument and tool for our company's performance and effectiveness.

Review.Titre: I was new to donor relations when…
Review.Contenu: I was new to donor relations when taking this position and DonorPerfect is the first database I have used. Learning DonorPerfect has been so simple and there is always someone ready to help when needed. I really enjoy how easy DonorPerfect is to use. All of the customizing that you are allowed from thank you letters to what you see for each donor is amazing. The reporting is simple and comes out very clean and organized.

No database is perfect, but DonorPerfect is pretty great!  The customer service is responsive and actually helpful, you're able to customize pretty easily, and all for a very reasonable price.  I do have to knock off a star just because you can't have household records.  We've worked around it, but it would certainly be helpful.

Donor Perfect is the only donor system I have ever worked with, so I can only go off of that experience. I enjoy using the system. It is (mostly) user friendly. The support team is always willing to answer questions and are very prompt with their responses. They are always updating different aspects of the system to make things better.

DonorPerfect PlatformI have been using DP for the past 6 years and just recently have gotten into trying to utilize the various reports. It is likely my knowledge base, but I find it very confusing. For example I asked support for assistance in developing a report that would tell us who donated recently that had not donated in the past 3 years. I received a quick reply and instruction that was 7 pages on how to create the report. I tried and got hung up on page 1. I have not revisited this task since. Support personnel are really great, I just have a bigger learning curve than most.

Review.Titre: We use donor perfect to track donations…
Review.Contenu: We use donor perfect to track donations from our donors breaking it down into reports to fit our needs for information. We use the reports to do mailings to solicit for different programs and needs. The mailing list we generate also helps with this.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect user since 2003 and increasingly pleased
Review.Contenu: I have used DonorPerfect since 2003.  It is an easily accessible ISP that will meet almost all the needs of small- to mid-sized non-profits.  It is affordable and flexible giving you the ability to re-design donor screens and add fields so that it works for your context.  In recent years, DP has become increasingly responsive to suggestions for updates from the users.  DP integrates with popular add-ons like Constant Contact reducing the amount of data entry.  And fund raisers can track their contacts and stay on task with Moves Management and calendar integration.  Reporting is far simpler than many other platforms.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect allows us to do so much!
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect allows us to do so much on one platform, tailored to our needs. Gift entry is simple yet comprehensive, reports range from plug-and-play to highly customizable, and the number of extra integrations allow for growth and adaptability.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect has been great at…
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect has been great at upgrading and making improvements that make the system user friendly. The simple steps and clean website make it easy to navigate from adding donor information, making reports or removing duplicate names.

As a non-profit board member, I am able to help with the database from home.  We have too little staff so some of our board needs to help with this for resource development.DP has a great deal of potential, but we don't have the staff to take advantage of all the features.  The learning curve is more than expected, especially when doing calculated formulas.  The webinars are pretty good and when I call I usually get excellent service.My bookkeeper does NOT like to JUST use DP.  She insists on staying with Quickbooks for monies.  The integration may take longer than one thinks.It has enhanced our ability to concentrate on folks who really support us.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect - great features and user friendly.
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect is user friendly and has great features that help keep us organized.  Building reports is sometimes difficult to navigate, but I've had very good experience getting help from the support team.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect is very helpful to our Non-Profit
Review.Contenu: Very helpful in keeping donor information in one place. We have just began filling in additional information (such as social media, etc.) for Foundations and Companies, and it is making it much easier for us!
I have been very pleased with the DonorPerfect platform.  It's a really solid piece of software with an outstanding customer service and Help center - the best Help center I've seen.
DonorPerfect makes tracking all of our donors easy and streamlined! A fantastic and user-friendly tool to keep us doing our best and keeping in touch with our supporters.

Review.Titre: I am still trying to get a good grasp.
16+ Years in Development and I love DPO
Review.Contenu: After 16+ years in the Development world I find DPO to be the best database.  It is user friendly and the support is outstanding.  Thank you DPO!
I am new to fundraising. DP is the only software of its type I have used. I find the software to be very workflow-oriented and intuitive to use.

Review.Titre: It's a great platform and I think it…
Review.Contenu: It's a great platform and I think it offers anything we need for our business, it can be a little bit confusing to learn however.

I'm a development director new to DonorPerfect. It's capacity daunts me and I recognize our office is not taking full advantage of the program. Every day I use the giving history to thank donors, making my gratitude specific to their designation, recognizing if the donor has honored someone with their gift, noting how the donor met us, how long they have been giving to us.At this year's end, I've been looking closely at the DonorPerfect analytics, particularly that Comprehensive Donor Review Analysis. I can see at a glance how many donors we've retained, how many lapsed donors have returned, how many new donors we have, how many gave two or more gifts last year -- and because I can pull up all their names, I plan to send a mid-year thank you note.I can't manage the ledger yet. My staff can do that, and I see regular reports, but I'm thinking about how to segment my donors. I want to browse a bit. But I won't really be ready to segment donors for another six months or more. I have time to learn.And I have six hours of one-on-one tutoring still to use. The first two-hour session was excellent.

Review.Titre: Very good software at a very good…
Review.Contenu: Very good software at a very good price. They offer many add-ons as well and partner with many other websites.
Our organization has grown significantly thanks to this platform. The support is fantastic as well!
Donor perfect keeps getting better. Their customer service is excellent and very available.

Review.Titre: Great Donor Database for Small Nonprofits on a Budget
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect Online is a great donor database/customer relationship management platform. As a small nonprofit on a very tight budget, finding a software solution that can handle all of our needs while still being budget-friendly is a must. DonorPerfect allows us to keep track of our donors and their gifts, do monthly payroll giving imports for mass gifts on a bi-monthly basis, create custom giving pages for specific funds/needs/campaigns, and has a lot of add on features. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars, is because many of the add on features cost additional money (text to give, ConstantContact integration, ReadSetAuction, etc. all great add ons, but most small nonprofits can't afford the additional expenses, so will either find a more cumbersome but cheaper method, or just forgo the expense). All in all, it's a great system with excellent customer service via chat or by phone (available 5:30am - 5:00 pm PST) that can help with onboarding and questions at every turn. Custom reporting makes it easy to do GL exports for accounting, board reports, annual reports, event reports, or nearly any report you can think of. Mailing/contact lists are easy to generate, and the ability to add custom flags allows you to easily segment your donors by whatever catagory you prefer (great for college foundations who want to track alumni, employee, trustee, board, or local business giving!)

Review.Titre: Helpful tools for reporting and planning
Review.Contenu: Helps us with tracking, reporting and planning our development strategies.
I like that I can call anytime and be walked through a question.
Excellent help desk. Fun, friendly and extremely knowledgeable.

Matt was very knowledgeable and helpful! Working with him helped me realize I made the right choice with DonorPerfect. To me, customer service is everything. Matt made the entire sales experience easy, informative and fun. Yes, fun. If Matt is an example of customer service I will receive implementing and managing our DonorPerfect CRM - wow! Matt told me all about the company - and it is employee owned. Makes me feel even better about my decision. Thank you Matt!!!!

The process of discovering the best CRM to utilize was easy from initial contact to conversation with the Regional Sales Director to the onboarding. Any information that I needed was quickly shared -- which allowed me to find grant support for Capacity Building to fund two years of the cost right up front.

Review.Titre: So glad to be back to DonorPerfect!
Review.Contenu: I've been a DonorPerfect user before, and then when working at other organizations had to use Blackbaud products, Bloomerang, and Salesforce. But none are as intuitive, comprehensive, and flexible as DonorPerfect. It's good to be home!

Review.Titre: Took the time to make sure I was comfortable.
Review.Contenu: Nikki was so helpful and took the time that was  needed to answer all of my questions.  She showed me how the platform is very user friendly and easy to customize for our specific needs.
Donor perfect offers so much more helps and tips for success for non-profits than any other processors that I have used in the past.

The Best! Donor Perfect is a wonderful CRM. It offers everything we need for gift entry, reporting tools, Quickbooks integration, monthly giving, CC processing, constant contact, giving campaign pages, and more. Customer service and help chat are excellent as well. The updates to the site are always well thought out and they walk you through any changes. The Knowledgebase and Suggest & Vote sections are great and show that the company really listens to our ideas.

DonorPerfect is awesome. During this epidemic, we can access DonorPerfect from anywhere. We can continue business as usual. We are able to keep track of our donors, gifts, access any report and what is most important is the fact that we can get one of their representatives to help, if needed, either by phone or through their by "chatting" with one of them, also through DonorPerfect's added feature..

Our last donor management software was very outdated and was hard to manage. Moving to DonorPerfect was one of the best decisions we have made on our development team. Through detailed tracking of trends, we can make more informed decisions on how to spend our fundraising dollars. I look forward to all the ways we can use this software to engage our current donors and reach new ones!

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect is a great donor…
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect is a great donor management system. So easy to check donor information, add donors/gifts and events. We use this system to send our EOY letters and emails. Again, very easy to do, especially since these tasks are infrequent. Their customer service is beyond compare and wish all services were just as helpful and positive! They assist with minor items as well as complex and always go above and beyond to help. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Suzanne my sales consultant was great
Review.Contenu: Suzanne my sales consultant was great, process has been smooth.  Only thing I would comment on is the initial payment process.  IT is a little confusing and I ended up with a second balance of $1.44 I had to pay separately because I didnt add something right.  A direct link with the invoice cost already populated would be nice but thats nitpicking.  So far so great.

Review.Titre: We've used DonorPerfect Online for more…
Review.Contenu: We've used DonorPerfect Online for more than 5 years.  It's been a great tool for us and has significantly improved our fundraising.  It's strongest feature is its help desk, where live agents are incredibly accessible and know their stuff.  I would recommend DonorPerfect Online to anyone looking for a Donor Management software.

Tom has been just amazing in answering all our questions and waiting patiently while our Nonprofit moved to a decision at a snail's pace.  We had our orientation meeting with Steve Smaglio who helped us create a timeline that will work with our drop dead date for functionality.

Every single time I reach out for support or with a question, the DonorPerfect team jumps in to help and quickly respond. If they don't have an answer right away, the work on getting you an answer as quickly as possible. They also continue to upgrade to meet needs for fundraisers like having immediate thank you letters/emails for each gift easily mail merged.

We are still in our first crowding campaign. So far...we are doing well.Overall, DonorPerfect has been a huge benefit to our ability to grow and manage our donor base.We are still learning and finding ways to improve.  The DonorPerfect team is very responsive in requesting and listening to our needs and making adjustments when to solve for the users of DonerPerfect.  Much appreciated.As changes continue in our world, DP is willing to change with the needs.

Review.Titre: I had several questions related to our current giving platforms
Review.Contenu: I had several questions related to our being able to continue using our current online giving platforms or not, which was clearly answered by the Donor Perfect rep. I feel confident going into the training time, that I will be listened to, and clear answers and direction given when I need it!thank you

Donor perfect responded so quickly with tons of new info and guidance during this crazy time.  I was so impressed by the information presented in such a concise and clear way  It gave me the quick tips i needed and the amazing support to do it.  Their support staff quickly went into high gear to continue the amazing help that i rely on and in addition still managed to also roll out a new release with many nice changes.  Impressive!!!

Review.Titre: Our nonprofit has been around for 55…
Review.Contenu: Our nonprofit has been around for 55 years, but never invested in software.  Tons of data has been collected but inconsistently, and there has never been a donor relationship system in place.  I knew presenting Donor Perfect to the board and Exec. Director would be difficult, but it is something we need with a one-person development team.  I spent an hour demoing the software with Jeremy and I knew how important it was for us to have the amazing features provided.  It would make the difference between surviving and thriving.  I took all the information Jeremy provided, along with our recorded demo video and presented my case.  48 hours later I am writing my review!

Review.Titre: Intro and Demo of Donor Perft
Review.Contenu: From the first introduction to donor perfect to the demonstration is was excellent. Taking with Suzanne about the use of  DP in our nonprofit made us feel secure in choosing them.

What I like about Donor Perfect is that it is always changing to benefit organizational productivity and user's ease. We've been using DP for years and the changes the company has made has really helped make my life easier. They really listen to what is needed and what they can do to be better.Creating weblinks, acknowledging donations, and maintaining donor records is such a breeze!

We have used the Support and Training teams multiple times over the past few months. Everybody has been polite, knowledgeable, good communicators and always follows up on all action items. The product is solid with lots of features and easy to use. Very pleased with both product and support/training.

Review.Titre: We have been using Donor Perfect for our organization donor tracking
Review.Contenu: We have been using Donor Perfect for two years now and we are very satisfied with the software. It is well designed, very functional, easy to use and learn. The best part about Donor Perfect is DP support team. Whenever I tried "Live Chat Support", they were always available to help me out. They would provide step-by-step procedures for me to take. They are very patient and kind. Another thing I love about this software is numerous reports you can run. You can customize calculated field easily and I think you can almost get any report you are looking for.

Donor perfect support is stellar. They are always super fast in responding via chat and phone and they are always knowledgeable and able to clear explain the step by step process of what I need to accomplish. They are also polite and friendly--I know I am speaking to a real human being and that is encouraging when you don't know what the heck you're doing and in need of some hand holding.

Overall, I think this is wonderful software.  As someone who is newer to the non-profit world, I was able to pick up DonorPerfect with ease. I feel fully supported when I have questions and feel empowered to engage with my constituents based on the data in DonorPerfect. I would highly recommend any non-profit to consider donor perfect for all their fund raising and data basing needs.

Our organization is so pleased with DonorPerfect. It is a well-developed and thoughtful program. Their integrations with other programs can also be helpful depending on your need. Their chat feature is the most important feature to me. You always chat with a real person who is very knowledgable no matter what level of question you ask.

I have had last minute questions and was able to set up a one on one personal training to help walk me through my need to set up monthly recurring donations. Joanne spent so much time clearly explaining the process step by step. I'm thankful for her knowledge and ability to explain everything so I can move forward with my work.

Suzanne Gildea was an excellent person to have as Hands to the Future consultant with onboarding.  H2TF is a new nonprofit and we had to take time to learn what was best for our organization now and as we continue to grow.  Suzanne was attentive to details and answered questions.  We are excited to be a part of the DonorPerfect network.

If I could figure it out, I would give Donor Perfect 4 1/2 stars.  We have used it for years and continue to learn about its vast capabilities. Their support team is very helpful; they patiently walk through more complex reporting when the steps are not as intuitive as I might need.

DonorPerfect has been the best CRM I have ever worked with! Even during the COVID-19 pandemic, DonorPerfect has been nothing but supportive for us, their clients. They have made free webinars available and their customer service is ALWAYS available whenever I need them. Their clarity and help have been extremely appreciative and their easy-to-use system is just the cherry on top!

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect is one of the best Tools for a any Organization no matter the size.
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect has been a great tool that I have come to really enjoy. It is a great for keeping track of all of our donors and the information is so easy to find. There are so many helpful reports that we can have within minutes that provide detailed information about our donors, prospects, members, cash flow, etc. It is also great to know that I can always call and speak to one of DonorPerfect's representatives that is always so friendly and ready to serve you.

Every time I need to call for help with how to run an annual report or some type of new report, your customer service staff are always so helpful! I've been using Donor Perfect for eight years now and I love that you keep updating and making things easier and more awesome!

Review.Titre: Easy for admin, and easy for use in the field.
Review.Contenu: In our organization, there are different levels of tech-savvy but almost everyone uses the DP database and reports for some area of their work.  The platform has made it easy to be the administrator; settings and changes are user-friendly.   The Donor Perfect Community and Knowledge base are great resources as well as the on-line chat feature.  The mobile app allows fundraisers in the field to access their donor's information quickly.We picked a package that was good for our particular needs, and we have always gotten great support.

Donorperfect is a wonderful tool for us. It’s provides the reposting we need and is such a user friendly database. The support staff are unparalleled in their expertise and their ability to walk you through any situation you have. Would recommend them to anyone wanting a great database product.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect is a very user-friendly…
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect is a very user-friendly system with a ton of opportunity for customization. It is easy enough for the beginner to get started, but has lots of extras for the advanced user as well. While there are occasional issues/glitches (what system doesn't have those?), the support team is constantly working to fix them as well as add new features and improve existing ones. I think this will only get better as time goes on as they seem very responsive to user feedback and are proactive about getting opinions on new ideas from the end user.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect’s chat feature is the best!
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect’s chat feature is fantastic!  If you are formulating a new report or adding to an existing report, having immediate answers to your questions is a huge timesaver!  The chat agents are always friendly and stay online until all of your questions have been answered! A+++

Review.Titre: We've used DP Online for the past 5…
Review.Contenu: We've used DP Online for the past 5 years.  It has helped us streamline our processes in a multitude of ways.  And it's strongest component is the help desk.  It's the best I've seen across most industries, even beyond fundraising software.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect is always on top of our… ever changing world
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect is always on top of our ever changing world. They come out with ways to help with fundraising in our uncertain times. They are always willing to help with questions or give a better suggestion to help us achieve our goals. Always very helpful!

DonorPerfect costumer service members are always so helpful and friendly. I have learned how to use DonorPerfect to its full potential and discovered things I didn't know it could do which have been helpful to my work. I find the transcripts of chats to be very helpful as well--I can use them to look back on questions I have had before and it saves me lots of time if I run into a similar scenario again.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect is the BEST fundraising  program for the money!
Review.Contenu: I have used DonorPerfect for over 15 years and purchased it at every nonprofit I worked at.  It is so easy to use and required very little training to get started.  They are always adding new additions and making improvements to the program.  They provide training on everything and their customer service is awesome.

Review.Titre: Your consistent yet not annoying follow…
Review.Contenu: Your consistent yet not annoying follow ups, the availability to talk & show me my options as well as what you offer for the price at a non pressure sales approach is ultimately what led me to choosing you. Can’t wait to explore the platform & what we can do with it.

Review.Titre: We use DonorPerfect for more than just fundraising.
Review.Contenu: We chose DonorPerfect because it could do most of what we wanted and I was able to add fields and screens to do the rest of what we wanted to do. So, we are doing more than fundraising; we are keeping track of tuition for our classes, doing class and event registrations as well. The support is great and they are always making improvements.

Review.Titre: The secret to our organization's organization!
Review.Contenu: Pros: The support team is incredibly responsive to both call and text, even during peak work hours and during the pandemic. The reports are also very versatile, and we always get all the information we need. The ability to track everything from campaigns to sub-solicitors is very useful to help produce marketing data. The knowledge base also covers everything I've had questions on.Cons: Minor bugs, but those get fixed just shortly after I notice them. If I were to nitpick I could say some things could be more aesthetically pleasing.Overall: The overall experience has been incredibly positive. I am not quite sure how we would keep track of our donations had it not been for DP. Favorite part is definitely the support team, least favorite is that sometimes the receipting can get confusing.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect - Suggest and Vote works!
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect continues to be up to date with current issues and is changing rapidly to keep up with user suggestions. Their "Suggest and Vote" feature brings users issues to all and implements the most popular ones in a timely manner. Love that!

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect is the best donor…
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect is the best donor management software out there. It is user friendly, easy to use, and intuitive enough to create detailed reports. There are many functionalities on the site that will help any non-profit thrive.

I love DonorPerfect. When you are looking for a way to ensure that you provide the best customer service to your donors and need some place to capture all of their information, look no farther. It has made my data capturing work-life more fun and a whole lot easier.

Donor Perfect has been a part of our fundraising efforts since 1998.  We started with the installed version and now of course are online.  We love the reports it provides, how it keeps track of campaigns, and how we are able to acknowledge gifts.  Most of all, we love the great customer service that Donor Perfect provides!

The reason DonorPerfect is the best is because they constantly ask, “how can we do better?”  They are not satisfied with past accomplishments. The platform is flexible, intuitive and robust. We love DonorPerfect and have been using the product for 7 years.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect is a well rounded product.
Review.Contenu: We are very pleased with our choice of Donor Perfect.  Their software provides a very robust product to meet the needs of many development offices.  Their customer service, training and knowledge is second to none.  They also continue to provide improvements to their product.

Easy to use, constantly updating features to make things work smoother.  I love that if you need help with anything I can call and anyone that answers can help with any issues instead of being transferred around from person to person.

We are long time satisfied customers. We have used the Donor Perfect system for many years. It is an excellent complement to our POS system, which stores only minimal data.The DP team is always responsive to issues and suggestions.

I’ve been using DonorPerfect two years after using another fundraising software program. The program is very easy to use, and if I need additional help, customer services is only a phone call away. It’s convenient to have the online forms available so you set them up and don’t have to worry about them and it’s easy for our donors to make one-time gifts, monthly gifts, sign-up for events and we even use them for our volunteer hours. There are some features I would like to see added to DonorPerfect. We are able to request specific information be added to help with the ease of working in the program and hopefully, it doesn't take too long for our suggestions to be used.

James Mann has been amazing! From our first phone call to becoming a DonorPerfect customer, he has been there to help and guide through the process. Nikki reached out immediately to set up our first call. Thank you

I've been using DonorPerfect for almost a year now and have enjoyed the product and process thoroughly. Having used another fundraising platform prior, I have found DonorPerfect to be far superior in ease of use and results. Data entry and management is straightforward and mail merging is a much simpler process than I was using before. The spreadsheets I generate are exactly what I need and customizable when called for. For our small non-profit, DonorPerfect is well, perfect!

Review.Titre: Working with Donor Perfect has been…
Review.Contenu: Working with Donor Perfect has been such an easy experience.  Their support staff works hard to make sure you have what you need, and they are open to any adjustments that need to be made to make your experience easier.  The only thing I have a hard time with is a couple of the forms, but it's easily fixable!

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect is a very important tool…
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect is a very important tool in my every day work. What I like the most about DP is that they are always interested in getting their client's feedback to be able to improve and add value to the product they offer, making our job easier.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect has a wealth of tools, features, and capabilities.
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect is a very large and robust program. It has a large array of tools, features, and capabilities. The learning curve can be a bit of a challenge but it's definitely worth it. All detailed things that have a wide variety of options can take some time to learn thoroughly...That being said, the features and functions are comprehensive. It's really a one-stop-shop for so many things you'd have to piecemeal otherwise. I highly recommend the platform.I also appreciate the affiliate software integrations. Like with constant contact, it's very useful to have that email feature/function on a platform that I'm familiar with but in a way that's integrated with the DonorPerfect software.

I love DonorPerfect software, It is robust to say the least. Customer service is exceptional and always professional. I've had many reports assistance to run with many criteria to filter out, and the staff members are always there to help me until 500 PM PST. That is awesome in my book!

I mostly recommend DP to my contacts because of their great customer service. Whether by phone or chat, I have had only great service and my questions are always answered.Their in-person workshops are also hugely helpful.

DonorPerfect user for 6+ years! I find DonorPerfect to be very user friendly. There are some tools that I use daily and their are others that only come up maybe once a year. When I am not sure how to run a report that I need, I can either go watch explanatory videos through their on demand seminars or directly ask for help from one of their many well versed employees. Once I am told and shown how to complete the task I need, DonorPerfect sends me an email with the line by line details of how to do the task so that I will have for the next time.

Review.Titre: My compliments to the DonorPerfect Team
Review.Contenu: My onboarding Specialist, Michael Carboni granted me with access to The DonorPerfect platform on the same day of our kickoff meeting. My Sales Contact, Andrew Shaw was very prompt with answering all my questions! Thank you both for your professionalism and assistance!

Review.Titre: We have been so pleased with…
Review.Contenu: We have been so pleased with DonorPerfect. As a small non-profit, DonorPerfect seemed ideal due to the price. But as we have used them, we are amazed with all the features. It is wonderful to have Ready/Set/Auction and Constant Contact integrated in the program. DP is easy to use -- easy to train someone new to use -- and invaluable as a resource for our non-profit.

Review.Titre: The best thing about donor perfect is…
Review.Contenu: The best thing about donor perfect is the ability to search up past donations. It seems trivial at first, but past support is critical information that can affect the future. I love the ability to do that.

Review.Titre: The best part of using Donor Perfect is their great support system.
Review.Contenu: The best part of using Donor Perfect is that they are always there to help.....with webinars, community dialog, and help through personal phone calls. In the year I have been using them, our fundraising efforts are more streamlined, and DonorPerfect provides invaluable information to board of directors and other constituency groups.

Review.Titre: We have used Donor Perfect since 2008
Review.Contenu: We have used Donor Perfect since 2008, as the main user of a fundraising platform i happened to be on maternity leave when DP was put in place and when I returned I noticed there were things that hadn't been moved over etc and that needed tweeking, DP were excellent at helping and doing what was needed. This was before it was web based. There was always someone on the other end of the phone to help.When we migrated to DP web base it was even easier. There is chat online and someone on the end of the phone to help. Now more than ever we can make the interface look how we need to it to look for what we need and it is growing with us.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect is the platform to use for…
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect is the platform to use for all your donor needs.Customer Service is A+++TutorialsConstant upgradesTons of ReportsWebinarsDonorPerfect strives to be #1 staying up to the minute with technology and new platforms.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect continues to be a stellar…
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect continues to be a stellar fundraising tool for our team. Every year we use even more of its features, which are many, and the support department, in my opinion, are 2nd to none in the industry!

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect is user friendly, affordable, and the informative!
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect is simple to use. Customer service is extremely helpful and will take time to walk you through the steps to complete a task. I always feel up to date and they offer great ideas on how to expand your vision and meet your fundraising goals.

Without DonorPerfect, I wouldn't be able to adequately fundraise for my non-profit during this pandemic.  DonorPerfect has made it easier than ever to fundraise and has even given free trials to some of their add-ons to help during these trying times.

I have been working from home for 3 weeks and using Donor Perfect has been seamless from working at the office. I've also appreciated some of the emails with suggestions on how to still try and raise money in this crazy time.

Review.Titre: DP is perfect for our needs...
Review.Contenu: We are a small educational non-profit that raises funds to support academics in one high school. We use Donor Perfect to manage our donor database and to facilitate communication. DP is perfect for our needs, and easy to learn and use. I highly recommend DP for any organization similar to ours.

Donor Perfect as awesome software.  It can do just about anything you can imagine and one million things you never even thought of.  Their technical support is awesome.  I couldn't do my job without you guys!

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect is an environment where I…
Review.Contenu: Donor Perfect is an environment where I feel confident that the choices are smart and well-thought out, regardless of how little knowledge I may bring to the table. Many thanks, Dan Ellis, Franciscan Charities, Inc.

I recently had an opportunity to use tech support.  The tech was thorough, courteous and made sure I understood the steps I needed to take get the information in report center I needed in the format I needed.   She was very efficient at her job and I appreciated her expertise.

Donor Perfect has provided a fabulous donor CRM and beyond that, excellent customer support. I have called them with questions about every aspect of the platform and what I need to do to make it work. They are prompt, and have walked me through or showed me how, to do everything. For someone who is not a tech expert this is so important,  I love it!!

Review.Titre: I have been using DonorPerfect for 10…
Review.Contenu: I have been using DonorPerfect for 10 years now on different platforms.  They continue doing upgrades for the times.  They have great support and sales.  I would highly recommend them for your donor database and more!

Review.Titre: I appreciate the responsiveness of the…
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the responsiveness of the DPO support team and their willingness to work through the issues we are dealing with. Usually on report building. I am always confident that our issues will be resolved. Great people! Helping us manage our donors and develop meaningful data to maintain those relationships.

Review.Titre: Donor Perfect helps you personalize donor relations
Review.Contenu: I love that I can integrate with Donor Search to learn about a person's past giving history to learn more about their interests.  Donor Perfect also lets us upload a photo of our donors so we can easily identify them when they visit us or attend a function.I wish the photo upload offered a larger image and multiple images, some donors send me pics of their visits and pets and it would be great to also store those right in their DP account.Donor Perfect allows us to personalize our communications with donors through tailored emails,  videos and invitations.  The program lets us track donor communications via the contacts section and set filters that allow us to run reports to see who showed interest or offered support for a particular project or program, and easily identify those we need to circle back to.

Review.Titre: Great response to any and all questions
Review.Contenu: I found their response to any question/concern to be immediate. And even after the first call they follow up. I am impressed with the service and I think that is very important when working with a program that offers so many possibilities.
At first I was frustrated that I could not just jump in and get started inputting my data right away, but I think they way you have it laid out sets us up for a smoother, more successful transition

Review.Titre: This year we have seen real results from Donor Perfect
Review.Contenu: This year we have seen a substantial rise in our donor retention rate over two years ago.  We attribute this to the segmentation Donor Perfect has allowed us to achieve in our marketing and the better timeline and personalization with which we can thank our donors.

Review.Titre: A great platform for small non-profits
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect has been a great platform to allow our small non-profit to maximize the impact of our limited personnel support.  It has great tools for donor database management, trends analysis, and donor communication.  The 3rd party integrations and a la carte packaging allowed us to tailor to our specific needs.  We saw results with our donor pool almost immediately.

Review.Titre: I use DonorPerfect at work everyday
Review.Contenu: I use DonorPerfect at work everyday. Since Covid-19 hit, I have been working 90% of the time from home. It has been a very easy transition to work from home using DonorPerfect. It is also very easy to pull all necessary reports to see who has given us donations in the past, but not this year.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect is the best tool out there…
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect is the best tool out there for nonprofits to use for their donor management, fundraising goals, and reports. The training modules and support team are a wonderful asset for new and existing users.

Review.Titre: Suzanne G was very helpful as a good…
Review.Contenu: Suzanne G was very helpful as a good listener as to what our non profit is all about and how we would be needing and using the tools available through DonorPerfect.
You are doing great.  We have many of our development department signing up and attending you webinars to learn more about Donor Perfect.  Thank you for that resource!

Review.Titre: Andrew was very patient and made sure…
Review.Contenu: Andrew was very patient and made sure everyone's questions were answered to their satisfaction.  Our Board members asked lots of detailed questions and he was patient in explaining how the database operates.

We are in year three of working with the Donor Perfect software and we continue to find more and more ways for it to add value to our fundraising efforts.  While we are a relatively small non-profit, Donor Perfect scales to our needs easily and allows us to stay in touch with all our donors through the Constant Contact interface.  The ease in segmenting our donors to provide custom contacts and the straightforward custom reporting are two areas that are extremely beneficial to me.  I have recommended Donor Perfect to all the other non-profits that I interface with.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect helps with fundraising challenges during COVID 19
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect is constantly exploring new ways to support their customers no matter the situation.  COVID 19 has created many challenges for businesses.  DonorPerfect has helped with many solutions for these businesses.

99% of the time, whom ever I speak to at  DonorPerfect  support, helps me 100%.  If they do not know how to help, they usually speak to other's in the DP support, and get back to me.  The service since I've been using DP online over the last 6 years has been wonderful.

Review.Titre: The support we have received has always…
Review.Contenu: The support we have received has always been wonderful.  but during this difficult time DP has really stepped up to make sure we are getting everything we need!
DPO support team is very responsive and helpful. Beside we have some customised solution on top of generic platform, they are always willing to help. Great job support team👍👍

DonorPerfect has THE BEST customer service I've ever encountered! They respond quickly, they're knowledgeable, they walk you through the problem you're having, and then send you step by step instructions afterwards so you can easily refer back to them.  As an organization we're able to track our donors efficiently, balance donations with our accounting department, and have vital reports easily accessible.

Since we switched to using DonorPerfect, we are constantly finding more and more ways to utilize the onboard tools and reports.  Technical support is just a call away and excellent.  Having a platform like DonorPerfect is definitely an added benefit during the current worldwide pandemic.
Suzanne Gildea was amazing, patient, and very helpful answering ALL of our many questions.  She was prompt in emailing and setting up Zoom meetings for tutorials.

Review.Titre: DonorPerfect is great for our smaller…
Review.Contenu: DonorPerfect is great for our smaller organization.  It is very user-friendly and there are helpful videos for anything that may challenge users.  I especially like the reporting function and the ability to export to Excel.
The DP Community and Learning Center are great resources for everyone, from the beginner to the seasoned user.  User updates and enhancements to the system make my job easier too.

Our organization has always been very pleased with the Donor Perfect program and the Donor Perfect awesome employees that have helped us.  DP is user friendly and they listen to their clients concerning recommendations to make it more user friendly.
We are not extraordinarily ambitious about how we use DonorPerfect,  since our donor list is small,  but it adequately serves all of our needs with a minimum of hassle.

Unfortunately, the COVID-19 virus is hitting us all very hard. Knowing that we continue having a trustworthy program from Donor Perfect, with amazing ideas to raise money, we can continue to hopefully bring in money.
Simple and complete.Donor perfect has always been our data management for our non-profit organization. We find it easy to use and the support is always there.
Patient, thoughtful approach to the training.Provided direct answers to questions with immediate follow-up material. Inspired confidence.
